interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BJÖRN HALL Nurse Headband with Buttons for Face Mask | Elastic Swimsuit Material, Smooth & Stretchy | Ear Saver Headband with Buttons | Perfect for Nurses, Doctors & Medical Students
Review Date: 2020/08/24
Store: Björn Hall
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 4.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: Well designed all black, stretchy headband with 2 side buttons to fasten face masks too as opposed to wrapping them around the ears. If you wear face masks for extended periods this is a great alternative solution as it puts the stress on the headband as opposed to the ears. This is an all black headband on both the material and buttons and looks great on men as well.
Review Title: Giving the ears a breather
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
100 pcs Compressed Facial Mask Women DIY Beauty Facial Cotton Paper Compress Masque Disposable Dry Sheet Mask for Skin Face Care
Evoio
{'Brand': 'Evoio', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Cotton Paper', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '100.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 4.41 x 2.87 inches; 5.96 Ounces'}
Product comes in a small fabric pouch containing 100 individually sealed compact paper masks. The masks are folded in such a way that they're compressed to the size of 2 nickels stacked on top of each other. To use you simply pour lotion or facial cream onto it and then slowly and carefully unfurl it on your face. The first time around you'll likely waste a few masks as the paper is very thin and if you're not careful they tear quite easily. That said once you get the hang of it they provide a decent and cost friendly way to get a homemade lotion mask treatment.
Lotion mask on the cheap
Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'}
Product comes in a clear plastic spray bottle containing 6.76 ounces of liquid. The liquid is lightly scented with floral essences and can be used in ways - if used as a toner you'll spray into a cotton ball and then rub it along your face. If can also be used as a skin mister for quick rejuvination of tired/dried skin as you need it. Product contains no alcohol and the floral formulation is fairly effective at removing dirt/grease from the skin.
Mild, floral scented toner
Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz)
GENTS OF LONDON
{'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'}
Product description as firm hold is spot on. Mind you 'firm' is not a 'strong' hold but it does manage to lock in short'ish hair properly in place with all the benefits of a wax styled product (ie - does not stiffen the strands). Product is listed as a 'matte' finish and while this is mostly true - when applied to dried hair it does leave behind a slightly greased finish. That said its a decent styling product that applies efficiently to the strands and gives you just the right level of control.
Firm hold is apt
Beast Blue Ultra Cooling Body Wash, 6 oz -Beast
Tame the Beast
{'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018539'}
Zippy and refreshing body wash nicely formulated with botanicals and essences to keep you feeling fine and fresh. Product comes in a plastic squeeze tube containing 6 ounces of gel. A little dab is all that's needed on a scrubby towel to generate rich lather and provide a proper wash. The menthol essence is pronounced so its best used during the warmer seasons to provide that nice, tingly cooling effect when you're done with the shower.
Keep it minty
I WOKE UP LIKE THIS Turn-over Rice Perfect Oil Foam Cleanser – A Hypoallergenic Cleansing oil, Foaming Face Wash with Rice Bran Extract. Makeup Removal, Deep Facial Cleansing for Sensitive Skin
I WOKE UP LIKE THIS
{'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'I WOKE UP LIKE THIS', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.31 x 1.54 inches; 2.43 Ounces'}
The 1 ounce version comes in a small pump dispensed bottle. The cleanser looks like clear liquid in the bottle but comes out as a nice foam and a couple of pumps is all that's needed for an adequate washing of your face. The active ingredient here is rice bran oil - but the wash doesn't feel oily at all. Provides a pleasant washing experience and when rinsed off leaves behind a nice, refreshed finish. Good for daily use and the 1 ounce version is compact enough for easy travel transport.
The power of rice bran oil
Nail Clipper Set, GIDIBII Luxury 18 in 1 Stainless Steel Nail Clipper Kit, Manicure Pedicure Care Tools with Portable Travel Case
GIDIBII
{'Brand': 'GIDIBII', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Manicure Set', 'UPC': '799445199218', 'Manufacturer': 'GIDIBII'}
Fairly comprehensive 18 piece home manicure set with implements for finger and toenails, eye brow grooming, callus treatment, nose hair scissors and an ear wax pick (common for use in Asia). The pieces are all constructed from black painted stainless steel and are mostly machined nicely. The pieces are all set in place in an included, snap shut, carry case.
Implements galore
RUGGED & DAPPER Active Regimen Grooming and Skincare Set for Men | Includes Body Wash Shampoo + Face Wash + Facial Moisturizer + Shaving Cream in a Travel Bag
RUGGED & DAPPER
{'Brand': 'RUGGED & DAPPER', 'Style': 'Travel', 'Closure Type': 'Zipper', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.75 x 5 x 5 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5 x 5 inches; 3 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'Active Regimen Grooming Set', 'UPC': '862332000437'}
Really good set of Men's grooming products  - everything you need to stay fit and fresh in and out of the shower with 16 ounce hybrid shampoo/body wash, 8 ounces of face wash, 6 oz of shave cream and 4 oz of facial moisturizer.  All of the products gets the job done nicely with good lather and a cleansing finish. The facial wash features micro rock particles to provide some exfoliating benefits. All 4 products come tucked in a black, zippered dop kit.
Good set
BJÖRN HALL Nurse Headband with Buttons for Face Mask | Elastic Swimsuit Material, Smooth & Stretchy | Ear Saver Headband with Buttons | Perfect for Nurses, Doctors & Medical Students
Björn Hall
{'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 4.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Well designed all black, stretchy headband with 2 side buttons to fasten face masks too as opposed to wrapping them around the ears. If you wear face masks for extended periods this is a great alternative solution as it puts the stress on the headband as opposed to the ears. This is an all black headband on both the material and buttons and looks great on men as well.
Giving the ears a breather
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Grooming Enthusiast:** The user continues to explore DIY beauty solutions and versatile products, now showing an increasing interest in personal grooming tools that enhance daily routines, specifically for both men and women.

- **Value-Conscious:** They consistently seek affordable yet high-quality options across beauty and grooming categories, prioritizing effective performance without overspending.

- **Product Experience:** Functionality and reliability are paramount in their beauty regimen. They appreciate formulations that offer multifunctional benefits, particularly those that are gentle on sensitive skin.

- **Material Awareness and Usability:** The user emphasizes hygiene and practicality, favoring user-friendly designs that ensure cleanliness while delivering effective results.

- **Target Skin and Hair Care Needs:** Maintaining hydration and nourishment for sensitive skin is a priority, focusing on products that promote moisture retention and overall health.

- **Guidance and Experimentation:** Eager to learn and experiment, the user values product performance and refreshing effects, welcoming community feedback on effective grooming and beauty solutions.

- **Expanded Interests:** Recent acquisitions reflect a growing commitment to practical grooming accessories and tools, showcasing a desire for quality and functionality that supports a polished appearance during day-to-day activities, particularly in settings that demand increased wear of protective gear.
